Description:
Metricon 29.1 Luxury Family Home on 553 Sq m Corner Block
This perfectly positioned Luxury Metricon 29.1 sq.family home,set in the Exquisite Park Central Estate is bound to impress anyone. Situated near various amenities such as the Officer train station,Shopping Centre, well sought after schools and access to the M1 Freeway.
This 4-bedroom family home will leave you in awe, only 2 years young, build on 553sqm corner block of land,which is hard to find these day, home will suit those looking for a contemporary and family ‘Home Sweet Home’ in family friendly most sought-after neighborhood with ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
You will be blown by the amenities this residence has to offer,such as the soaring ceilings,4 large bedrooms,master bedroom featuring an exceptionally large walk-in-robe and ensuite,other 3 large bedrooms have mirror built in robes with quality carpet.
butler’s kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, which includes 900mm gas cook top and oven, dishwasher and with large walk in pantry with second dish washing sink.
Property has been updated with hard wood timber polished timber floors.
North and east facing area of property has double glazed window to minimize the utility bills,with very large rumpus room and outdoor alfresco area.
There are so many other features this property has to mention, but not enough space to write so come along and inspect this beautifully presented family home this Thursday from 6:30pm to 7pm and Saturday from 12:30 pm to 1:00pm.
For further information please call 03 8768 8255
*Please Note* - Blue Sapphire Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number.
Photo ID is required upon entering the property.
Disclaimer:While reasonable care is taken in its preparation,BLUE SAPPHIRE REAL ESTATE does not guarantee or warrant the accuracy, reliability, completeness or currency of the content contained within this site or its usefulness in achieving any purpose.

Description:
Triple storey townhouse in leafy Officer
AGENT ONSITE: Under Construction (see open times)
Offering a nearly completed townhouse. Located in the popular Parkview Terraces development in the fast growing suburb of Officer.
Featuring a triple storey floorplan, this architecturally designed home is spacious and comes complete with an attractive list of turnkey inclusions.
- Walk to Lakeside shopping centre
- Walk to Cardinia Rd Train Station
- Quick and easy access to major roads
- Close proximity to primary and secondary schools
- Considerable stamp duty savings for owner occupiers
- 6 Star Energy Rating
$10,000 first home owner grant applies.
*Inspections - There will not be a home to inspect internally, however there will be an agent on site to show you around the development.
Not to be missed! Enquire to find out more information.

Description:
Timeless Elegance for Family Enjoyment
Peacefully nestled in a quiet court, beautifully built by Porter Davis and meticulously maintained by just one house-proud family, this exceptional single level home creates a modern environment with substantial space.
Located in the highly sought-after Arena Estate, the home itself provides luxurious and quality features that you are welcomed with when entering the property.
The exclusive master retreat is spacious with a walk-in robe and ensuite featuring stone bench tops and large shower. The remaining three bedrooms all boast an ample amount of floor space with built in robes and a large additional study. Enjoy the luxury of having a home theatre room, perfect for those quiet nights in or to keep the kids occupied.
The main hub of this home is where the open plan kitchen, meals and large living zone is, being integrated with so much natural light. Entertaining is effortless with beautiful timber bi-fold doors that flow to a great sized pergola area and a huge 818m2 approx. block, great for the kids and pets to enjoy. The kitchen is sure to impress the chef of the family, with the added luxury of stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops, 900mm oven/cooktop, dishwasher, breakfast bar and walk in pantry. Moving throughout the home you also have a rumpus room / 3rd living zone, ideal for a teenage retreat.
Other great inclusions are: 9ft ceilings, halogen downlights, ducted heating & split system cooling, double blinds, alarm system, NBN available & double remote garage.
Primely positioned within walking distance to the Arena shopping Plaza, St Francis Xavier College and a hop skip and jump to the park, only a short distance to Cardinia Train Station and M1 Freeway. If you are looking for high end, quality, space and a desirable location then look no further than 10 Gum Creek Close, Officer. You will not be disappointed.

Description:
Low Maintenance Home Sweet Home
* SOLD : Call Vincent Lim 0437 008 418 for similar property to purchase or to sell.
This approx. 12 months young property is one of a great house built by quality builder - Beachwood Constructions. The house constructed with customised design for additional study or office which can also be the 4th bedroom or nursery. Open plan kitchen adjoins the dining and family living area lead to outdoor alfresco for party and entertaining, overlooking no lawn-mowing yards.
Located in the convenience Arcadia estate, the house is within walking distance to Bridgewood Primary school and Harmony Place park. Lakeside square and Arena shopping centre, Officer secondary college, Officer Train Station, freeway access, future town centre, and the list goes on, are just within a short drive.
Other features include: -
• Ducted heating and cooling
• Stone benchtop in kitchen and bathrooms
• Stainless steel appliances with 900mm oven and cooktop
• Single garage but additional car spot at the front
• Double blind for privacy and provides shading to front windows
• Recycled water supply and NBN ready
• Alfresco living with café blind enclosed
• Minimal maintenance yards with artificial grass
• Extra cupboards attached to the garage wall for storage
• Driveways and concrete area including alfresco floor with colour sealed exposed aggregate
For a first home buyer, retiree, down-sizer, investor, or those who working from home or even a small growing family, this is a must inspect property. All the hassle and hard works of dealing with the progressed constructions, designs, builder communication, etc. had been done for you and for additional peace of mind this property also went through pre-handover inspection by a private inspector. Hence don’t missed out the opportunity of securing this home with so many extra and bonuses.
Contact Vincent Lim 0437 008 418 today before it goes under contract.
Photo ID is required for all inspections.

Description:
Titled Vacant Block in ARCADIA ESTATE!
If you looking to Build your DREAM HOME but don't want to wait. This is the perfect opportunity for you. Enjoy living in one of the most exciting estates in Melbourne!
Everything you need is right in your neighbourhood. Officer, Cardinia Road & Beaconsfield train stations are only meters away and it is a short drive to the Princes Highway and Princes Freeway.
A great choice of shopping centres, established shops, cafes, restaurants, gyms, and footy clubs.
You have choice of schools; public or private; primary or secondary. Berwick Grammar School and Minaret College are within walking distance while Primary Schools are just down the road.
Approximately 420 sqm with a 14m frontage and 30m of depth.

Description:
Stunning and stylish in Timbertop
Located in the highly sought after Timbertop estate, and boasting a superb street presence, you will be instantly drawn. This contemporary family home with flowing floor boards and an impeccable floor plan, is exactly what you have been looking for.
At the front of the home, you will discover the grand master bedroom with a twin walk in robe and fully equipped glamorous ensuite.
Comprising of multiple living areas, including theater room, closed in rumpus room with access to backyard, and family / meals area, as well as an open plan study, this home will easily accommodate all your family's needs!
A flawless oversized kitchen with stone bench tops, butlers pantry, dual ovens and ample cupboard space, perfect for any budding master chef.
Three further generous bedrooms, with two comprising of built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom. The third bedroom with four built in robes and another fully equipped ensuite.
Step outside to discover a paved area perfect for summer get togethers and ample grassed area for children to play.
Creature comforts include, but are not limited to ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, internal access to the house and single roller door access from the double car garage, Foxtel and NBN connected, an alarm system and dishwasher.
Within close proximity to Arena shopping centre, M1 freeway access, public transport and numerous excellent schooling options

YOU WON'T NEED TO PROSPECT ANYMORE!
If you're looking for a 4 bedroom family home on a corner block with side access and a large yard, then this home is for you. Spacious bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, remaining bedrooms with built in robes. Formal lounge, open plan kitchen, dining and family area, there is enough room for the whole family to enjoy. The kitchen is in the heart of the home and features 900ml oven and cooktop, walk in pantry and loads of bench space.
- Air conditioning
- Ducted heating

With everything to offer and so much more, close to schools, shops, and local transport in this popular estate it won't last long so make sure you come and have a look before auction night!!

Description:
Prime Land Facing Lake with An Educational Hub
Are you sick of waiting on the waiting list the estate office? Then act now to secure this premium land parcel.
14M frontage, 411m2 flat parcel of land with Lake views. Perfect place to build your dream home.
48 Grisham Drive, Officer VIC 3809
Arcadia Estate is designed carefully to bring the community together.
Just minutes walking distance to trains, future Officer Town Centre.
Enjoy a healthy lifestyle with 20 hectares of parkland, nature reserves and planned open spaces. Secure the best schools for your kids.
This is the most beautiful part of Officer. Be prepared to be surprised with the beautiful lakes and parks as you enter the estate.
Short walk to 3 schools.
- Officer Secondary College
- Officer specialist school
- 2 primary schools in the works
Short drive to
- Marantha Christian School
- St Francis Xavier College
- Berwick Grammar School
- Officer primary school
- St Brigid's Catholic primary school
- Heritage College
- Glenvale School
- Lakeside shopping centre
Other features of this area:
- Easy access to freeway
- Easy access to Princess Highway
- Walking tracks
- Scenic picnic areas around the lakes
- Walking Distance to Future Officer Town Centre
- The proposed airport announced in South East will add lots of value to the area.
This land is just titled and now looking for its new owners to build their new dream home.
First Home buyers pay no stamp duty and can help with organizing custom builder construction.
or
You can build with a builder of your choice.
Call us now to discuss further.

Description:
Adorable & Affordable
This instantly appealing single level, three-bedroom residence enjoys an easy to live in floor plan, in a convenient location in the heart of the Arcadia Estate. Impressed by impeccable style and charm, this affordable home can make a great first home, downsizer or add to your investment portfolio. This low maintenance residence is defined by its simple touches and neutral tones, the generously proportioned master suite is located at the front of the home displaying a stylish ensuite and walk in robe, whilst further down the house you will find the other two bedrooms, both offering built in robes and sharing a central bathroom. The home offers comforts such as ducted heating, split system cooling, an attractive kitchen overlooking family/meals area, and single remote garage. The home is positioned within proximity to shops, local schools, public transport and easy access to the M1 Freeway.

"DANA DELIGHT"
This exquisitely built home leaves nothing to be desired. Located within the prestiges Arcadia Estate in Officer, the location is second to none. With multiple shopping centres, restaurants, and schools including Bridge Water primary school right at your finger tips. But lets not forget the kitchen. The Masterchef of the family will not be disappointed! A generous sized island bench top with 40mm Caesar stone, with waterfall sides accompanied by stainless steel appliances, as well as a butlers pantry featuring all the storage space you could imagine.

- Master bedroom with large walk in robe & double vanity ensuite

- Caesar stone bench tops throughout.
- Open plan living and dinning area.
- Extra rumpus/ living area.
- Ducted heating and split system cooling.
- Outdoor alfresco area with down lights and fan.
This property is priced to sell, a must see to appreciate what is on offer. Put it on your shopping list for the weekend.

Description:
Timeless Design & Quality In The Heart Of Officer!
Luxurious in space and timeless in design and quality, this stunning Metricon home offers a premier family lifestyle in the heart of Officer.
Elegant interiors, timber look floors and a welcoming ambience permeate the 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom layout, with open plan living/dining and a contemporary stone kitchen (Island bench), unfolding through sliding doors to an entertaining alfresco and low maintenance surrounds. Modern stainless-steel appliances including 90cm cooker. A formal lounge is a bonus. Extras include split system cooling, tiles, carpet, gas ducted heating, internal access, double remote garage, garden shed, recycled water, all add lifestyle appeal.
Outdoors side access gates allow access to the ample 466 m2 block. Floor Plan available upon request.
Superbly located, close to Cardinia train station, Club Officer, M1 Freeway, parklands and schools.

Description:
Calling all first home buyers and investors
This 3 bedroom Sienna home is located in the very popular Arcadia estate. Featuring open plan living, master with full ensuite and walk in robe.
The amazing galley style kitchen offers stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and walk in pantry. Spacious living/family overlooking the outdoor courtyard.
Complete, gas ducted heating, split system cooling, gas hot water, low maintenance landscaped gardens and lockup garage with remote.
The property is positioned perfect in Officer to enjoy all the amenities mentioned, private & public schools. Minutes from Arena or Lakeside shopping and M1 access ramp.
Contact Ben Stuttard for further information on this fantastic property.

Description:
As Good as New In Arcadia
This near new home is sure to impress and is located in the exciting Arcadia Estate in Officer with easy access to the M1 freeway, Cardinia Road train station, shopping centres, schools and parkland.
Built only two years ago by a quality builder it offers the lucky new owner four bedrooms, the master having an ensuite and walk in robe whilst the remaining bedrooms all have built in robes and are serviced by the second bathroom.
Multiple living areas cater for the whole family and include an open plan tiled family room with a separate meals area plus a rear lounge room which makes the ideal space to sit back, relax and watch the latest blockbuster.
The kitchen is well appointed and will suit the chef of the family, featuring ample bench and cupboard space, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. An alfresco area is ideal for entertaining guests and overlooks the secure backyard, a blank canvas ready for the new purchaser to add their own finishing touches to.
Other features of this amazing home include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double garage with internal access and remote control door plus quality fixtures and fittings. This home will suit a variety of buyers so act now!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Located in the highly popular Northside, Timbertop Estate is a rare 740sqm block on offer! With a plethora of potential, you can build your dream home and have enough room for a great back yard and even a pool. With an unbeatable position, generous block size and opposite a park you can't ask for more! A guaranteed investment, and a savvy move for anyone wanting to enter the market.
Close proximity to Beaconsfield Town, Berwick Village, Fountain Gate shopping centre, prestigious schools, D'Angelos Winery, public transport, freeway access, sports and medical facilities.
Take advantage of this rare opportunity and call today!
